I'm not even sure what exactly is causing the game to behave as if my craft was destroyed, but whenever I undock a command module from a lander in an Apollo-style mission, the craft just plummets straight down towards the Mun and I lose all control of everything. I just use clamp-o-tron docking ports, same size on both ends. Happens upon restarting the game as well.

Edited February 26, 2023 by timskipudding
mistook undocking for decoupling. issue still present
Yes I am getting this in orbit around the Mun with the seniors.
Also having this issue, had a craft explode into a million pieces the second i undocked xD
